colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027B (CES SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI BA'I CHO GA DPAG BSAM SNYE MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA DAM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA'I DGONGS DON GTZO BOR BZUNG, CHOS RJE KUN DGA' TSUL KHRIMS DANG, BLA MA DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I YI GE GNAS KYANG CUNG ZAD KHA BSKONG TE, RANG GZHAN GYI NYAMS LAN DU ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS DBEN NAS THAR BRTZER SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG 'BYOR RO, ,)*, ,AOm SVA STI, ,KUN MKHYEN BLA MA 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YIS, ,RANG GZHAN NYAMS LEN CHED DU RAB DGONGS PA'I, ,RMAD BYUNG BYIN RLABS CHE BA 'DI LTA BU, ,BSAM PA DAG PAS BSTAN 'GROR RAB DMIGS @028B NAS, ,ZLA BA BYUNG NGO KUN GYI TSES BRGYAD LA, ,CHAG MED KHA 'DON BGYIS NA GNAS SKABS DANG, ,MTHAR THUG DON RNAMS 'GRUB PAR THE TSOM MED, ,CES GSUNGS DAM PA'I GSUNGS LA YID MCHIS NAS, ,CHOS LA 'DUN PA'I SKAL LDAN TSOGS, ,CHOS 'GRUB CHED DU PAR BSGRUBS DGES, ,CHOS 'DZIN TSOGS RNAMS ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,CHOS TSUL PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR SHOG , ,,@029A *, ,CHOS LA PHYOGS PA'I 'GRO BA RNAMS, ,CHOS KYI BAR CHAD MI BYUNG BAR, CHOS MCHOG SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB STE, ,CHOS KYIS 'GRO KUN 'DREN PAR SHOG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO BZANG BRKA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
